ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Server GM email adress
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to Sony s official Everquest website at http://everquest.station.sony.com There is an option to contact your server GM. It does not give you the server GM s
ygData.messageBody:
Go to Sony's official Everquest website at http://everquest.station.sony.com
There is an option to contact your server GM. It does not give you the
server GM's email addy, but it allows you to fill out a form to contact the
GM so they can email you in reply.
luv,
-Su

> Does anyone know a web site where I can get the email address of my
servers
> Lead GM? I have a problem, the guide that helped was great a gave us as
much
> information as she could and said she would pass it along to the GM. She
> instructed me to do a petition on Sunday through Thursday from 3 pm to 6
pm
> Pacific time. I did this yesterday and no real GM ever showed up and the
> guide that answered me yesterday was a guide and said I would have to keep
> trying. I would like to get his email address to start a dialog about the
> problem I have.
>
> Anyone know the web site or the Tunare Lead GM email address?
>
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
